# com.apple.CommCenter.fine-grained

**Property List Key**

An entitlement that grants access to CoreTelephony services.

## Discussion

Add this entitlement to your app, and include specific values in the array, to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreTelephony] APIs.

To request this entitlement for your app, fill out the request form for the specific value you need to use.
title: com.apple.CommCenter.fine-grained
